p.ph: Go to Oxygen XML WebHelp website, download the latest version of the installation kit, and unzip it.

Copy all plugin directories from the unpacked archive to the plugins directory of the distribution. This is necessary to enable certain functionality. For example, the com.oxygenxml.highlight directory adds syntax highlight capabilities to your WebHelp output for codeblock elements that contain source code snippets (XML, Java, JavaScript).

body.note: The first step of the procedure below instructs you to delete old directories/files before proceeding with the upgrade. It is recommended that you make a backup of these directories/files before deleting them. Make sure you make a backup of the licensekey.txt file since you will need the information contained in this file later in the upgrading procedure.
Built-in CSS rules will automatically use the variables defined here and in the next step.
If you are using the same color in both light and dark modes, you only need to define it for the light mode.
